name: Stars Games
description:
Spend some time with Hollywood stars through these 3 games all-in-one app without advertising.

- Stars Quiz : what is the name of the star?
You must to guess as soon as possible the name of a star.

- Stars Flap : what a pleasure to restore portrait of a star divided into 3 flaps.

- Stars Mahjong : according to the principle of the traditional game of Mahjong, associate identical stars by pair to clear them.

Have fun!...
